entity.name: German Center for Open Source AI
entity.description: GC.OS is a European umbrella organisation supporting a range of open source projects. GC.OS acts as a fiscal host and legal umbrella in the EU for supported projects.

projects.name: sktime
projects.description: sktime is the unified AI framework for time serie. The unified API supports model building, fitting, application, and validation. It has support for a variety of learning tasks including forecasting, time series classification, regression, clustering. It also supports composite model building, including pipelines with transformations, ensembles, tuning, reduction, and has interactive user experience with scikit-learn like interface conventions.

channels.description: BIC: GENODES1EHI. Please include "pgmpy" in the purpose.

plans.name: Part-time Developers
plans.description: Support towards covering the cost of maintainers working part-time on the project.

plans.name: Full-time Senior Developer (Maintainer) and Community Manager
plans.description: Support towards covering a single full-time maintainer and community manager position.
